headline: Meta Earnings, Fed Decision, Venezuela Testimony: What to Watch This Week
summary: Earnings season is in full throttle, with results expected from big-name companies including UnitedHealth, Chevron and Boeing. A quartet of tech giants—Apple, Meta Platforms, Microsoft and Tesla—will also report results.

headline: Northrop Grumman tops Q4 estimates but softer outlook sends shares lower
summary: Investing.com -- Northrop Grumman posted a stronger-than-expected fourth quarter, with earnings and revenue both coming in ahead of Wall Street forecasts, but the aerospace and defense firm’s weaker outlook sent its shares down in premarket trading.

content.title: Northrop Grumman tops Q4 estimates but softer outlook sends shares lower
content.summary: Investing.com -- Northrop Grumman posted a stronger-than-expected fourth quarter, with earnings and revenue both coming in ahead of Wall Street forecasts, but the aerospace and defense firm’s weaker outlook sent its shares down in premarket trading.

headline: Northrop Grumman’s (NYSE:NOC) Q4 CY2025 Sales Top Estimates
summary: Security and aerospace company Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) reported revenue ahead of Wall Streets expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 9.6% year on year to $11.71 billion. On the other hand, the company’s full-year revenue guidance of $43.75 billion at the midpoint came in 1.1% below analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $9.99 per share was 43.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

On the other hand, the company’s full-year revenue guidance of $43.75 billion at the midpoint came in 1.1% below analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $9.99 per share was 43.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Northrop Grumman: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: NOC) on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter profit of $1.43 billion. The Falls Church, Virginia-based company said it had profit of $9.99 per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, came to $7.23 per share.

content.summary: NOC) on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter profit of $1.43 billion. The Falls Church, Virginia-based company said it had profit of $9.99 per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, came to $7.23 per share.

headline: How Analyst Price Targets Are Shaping The Evolving Story For Northrop Grumman (NOC)
summary: Analysts have updated their narrative on Northrop Grumman, reflected in a revised price target that resets expectations for where the stock could reasonably trade. This change is tied to fresh views on the company’s risk and opportunity mix, based on recent commentary from the market. In the next sections, you will see how to keep on top of these price target shifts and what they may signal for your own research going forward. headline: Stock Index Futures Gain on Tech Boost, FOMC Meeting and Earnings in Focus
summary: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH26) are up +0.26%, and March Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQH26) are up +0.60% this morning, buoyed by gains in technology stocks, while investors await the start of the Federal Reserve’s two-day policy meeting, as well as a new round of U.S. economic data and corporate earnings reports.

headline: A Tiny Defense ETF Just Smashed The S&P 500 By Nearly 30% | PPA VOO
summary: The Invesco Aerospace & Defense ETF (NYSEARCA:PPA) has crushed the broader market over the past year, delivering 44% returns compared to the S&P 500’s 16% gain. This outperformance stems from concentrated exposure to defense contractors that benefit when military budgets expand and geopolitical tensions rise. The trend has accelerated recently as defense spending proposals gain ... A Tiny Defense ETF Just Smashed The S&P 500 By Nearly 30% | PPA VOO

headline: Northrop Grumman (NOC) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: The Northrop Grumman Corporation team delivered another quarter of strong operating results, generating the highest quarterly sales growth of 2025 and exceeding expectations across our key performance metrics.  Throughout the year, we kept a disciplined approach in executing our strategy, remaining true to our technology leadership and ensuring our company moves at the speed of relevance, particularly as our customers transform the way they acquire defense capabilities.  This business strategy includes our capital deployment plan, which prioritizes investments in value-creating growth opportunities, of which there are many in this current environment.

content.title: Northrop Grumman (NOC) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
content.summary: The Northrop Grumman Corporation team delivered another quarter of strong operating results, generating the highest quarterly sales growth of 2025 and exceeding expectations across our key performance metrics.  Throughout the year, we kept a disciplined approach in executing our strategy, remaining true to our technology leadership and ensuring our company moves at the speed of relevance, particularly as our customers transform the way they acquire defense capabilities.  This business strategy includes our capital deployment plan, which prioritizes investments in value-creating growth opportunities, of which there are many in this current environment.
